descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/37392-1-1373018885.png[/img]
Thought I would upload my work, because to share... always makes you feel a little bit better :)

Don't forget to endorse if you like it! And take pictures and upload them here! :)

--------------------
Required mod:
--------------------
(For the exact same face)
Coverwomen by mrLenski, choose look 3
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563//?] Coverwomen [/url]
And if you also love the eyes... [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D4869%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Covereyes[/url] by mrLenski ;)


If you are wondering what body texture I use it's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D6709&pUp=1] DIMONIZED UNP [/url] with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D6554&pUp=1] navetsea's skin texture [/url] and to avoid neck seams I just use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D3563&pUp=1] Coverwomen's seamless UNP [/url].


--------------------
Installation:
_____________________________________________________________________________________________
NMM: Download with manager and activate! Or download file, then add it to manager and then activate.
Manually: Download file, unzip and drag the content to your Data folder, open your skyrim launcher and make sure the Borgakh.esp is checked in "Data Files".
_____________________________________________________________________________________________

I have set Borgakh weight to be 60, so you might need to "confirm" that in console command (in-game) to avoid neck seams or a funny body weight compared to the head.
------> Open console command, click with the mouse on Borgakh (so her npc id shows) and type: setnpcweight 60
Her head will turn white, but don't worry, just hit the save game button and exit game.
Launch the game again and voil√†! Her face has turned into the right colour and the weight is corrected after my mod!


--------------------
Uninstallation:
_____________________________________________________________________________________________
NMM: Deactivate and delete!
Manually: Delete Borgakh.esp and Borgakh.bsa from your Data folder!
_____________________________________________________________________________________________

--------------------
Thanks to
--------------------
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2753566/?tb=mods&pUp=1] foretrenty [/url] for his awesome [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4554/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D4554%26preview%3D&pUp=1] Skyrim NPC Editor[/url]!
